name: Inferno Dealer
description:
This is my submission to Mini Jam 69.

I tried my best to make a 2D platformer shooter that fit the limitation and theme. This game is the result of that attempt, it's a platformer, where you shoot cards that have different effects. There's only 4 types of cards right now, I ran out of ideas really quick. There's also only one level for the same reason, but I tried my best to kind of showcase what each card did.

Controls

- Move with WASD

- Jump with Space

- Change selected card with Q and E

- Aim with the mouse cursor

- Throw cards with Left Mouse Click

Credits

- Unity for the game

- Cakewalk for the music

- Bfxr for the sound effects

- Piskel for the art
